media:group.media:title: Armenia rejects Aliyev‚Äôs ‚ÄòWestern Azerbaijan‚Äô rhetoric
media:group.media:description:
üìç Armenian Prime Minister Nikol Pashinyan outlined Armenia's position on territorial definitions, refugee rights, and a 12-point roadmap for regional peace, while firmly rejecting Azerbaijani President Ilham Aliyev's "Western Azerbaijan" narrative as a threat to Armenia's territorial integrity. üìç In a press conference, Foreign Minister Ararat Mirzoyan also touched upon Azerbaijan‚Äôs narrative of ‚ÄúWestern Azerbaijan‚Äù that he described as a direct territorial demand on Armenia, also calling the concept of Zangezur Corridor unacceptable. üìç Armenia‚Äôs government approved and submitted to parliament a bill initiating the process of accession to the European Union.

entry.title: First American romantic comedy filmed in Armenia

media:group.media:title: First American romantic comedy filmed in Armenia
media:group.media:description:
In this Civilnet podcast, British-Armenian stand-up comedian and actor Kev Orkian provides an exclusive behind-the-scenes look at the making of Armenia's first-ever American romantic comedy film. Orkian, who is involved in the production process, shares his insights on the unique challenges and opportunities of blending Armenian culture and storytelling with the Hollywood rom-com format, as well as the significance of this cinematic milestone for the country's burgeoning film industry.

entry.title: The Mystical Sound of Oud: A Session with Tigrane Kazazian

media:group.media:title: The Mystical Sound of Oud: A Session with Tigrane Kazazian
media:group.media:description:
Tigrane Kazazian was not destined for music and even less so for the traditional oud. Nonetheless, it has been two decades now that the artist has made it his instrument of choice. Between tradition and modernity, he always adds a part of improvisation in his unique compositions. Immerse yourself in a mystical experience in this musical session with Tigrane Kazazian.
Thanks to The State Philharmonia of Armenia / Arno Babajanyan Concert Hall for hosting the music session.

Entre tradition et modernit√©, Tigrane ajoute toujours une part d‚Äôimprovisation dans ses compositions uniques. Plongez dans une ambiance mystique dans cette session musicale avec Tigrane Kazazian. Remerciements chaleureux Philharmonie nationale d'Arm√©nie / Salle de concert Arno Babajanyan pour l‚Äôaccueil.
